title:
Different answers about Kerr Ave and MLK half clover interchange with bridge. 

Are we getting the interchange with the current(8/2016) widening construction ? If not, when it is scheduled starting and completion?  thanks.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/08/when-is-construction-planned-on-the-kerr-avenue-and-martin-luther-king-parkway-interchange/
